    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewBlocked(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)

    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewBlockedBy(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)

    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewFriendOfs(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the list of those who added this node to friends, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewFriendOfsTotal(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of those who added this node to friends, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewFriends(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the list of friends, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewFriendsTotal(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of friends, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal

    Retrieves the permission to view the list of subscribers, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PeopleOperations.getViewSubscribersTotal(PeopleOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of subscribers, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.

    static Principal
